channel.title: Grid 4 on Documentation Selenium
channel.description: Recent content in Grid 4 on Documentation Selenium

item.title: Composant
item.description: Page being translated from English to French. Do you speak French? Help us to translate it by sending us pull requests! Router The Router takes care of forwarding the request to the correct component. It is the entry point of the Grid, all external requests will be received by it. The Router behaves differently depending on the request. If it is a new session request, the Router will forward it to the Distributor (where the new session creation will be handled).
